it.unibo.alchemist.model.interfaces

Interface IObstacle2D

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable, Shape
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RectObstacle2D

    public interface IObstacle2D
extends Serializable, Shape

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getId() 
      double[] nearestIntersection(double startx, double starty, double endx, double endy)
      Given a vector (represented as a starting point and an end point) and a rectangle, computes the intersection point between the vector and the rectangle nearest to the vector's starting point.
      IPosition next(double sx, double sy, double ex, double ey)
      Given a vector (starting point and end point) representing a requested move, this method computes a new end point, representing a cut version of the initial vector, modified in such a way that the end point is outside the obstacle.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.awt.Shape

        contains, contains, contains, contains, getBounds, getBounds2D, getPathIterator, getPathIterator, intersects, intersects

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        int getId()
        Returns:
        the id for this obstacle

      • next

        IPosition next(double sx,
               double sy,
               double ex,
               double ey)
        Given a vector (starting point and end point) representing a requested move, this method computes a new end point, representing a cut version of the initial vector, modified in such a way that the end point is outside the obstacle.
        Parameters:
        sx - start x coordinate of the vector
        sy - start y coordinate of the vector
        ex - end x coordinate of the vector
        ey - end y coordinate of the vector
        Returns:
        the intersection point between the vector and the rectangle nearest to the vector's starting point

      • nearestIntersection

        double[] nearestIntersection(double startx,
                             double starty,
                             double endx,
                             double endy)
        Given a vector (represented as a starting point and an end point) and a rectangle, computes the intersection point between the vector and the rectangle nearest to the vector's starting point.
        Parameters:
        startx - start x coordinate of the vector
        starty - start y coordinate of the vector
        endx - end x coordinate of the vector
        endy - end y coordinate of the vector
        Returns:
        the intersection point between the vector and the rectangle nearest to the vector's starting point
